00030 class Spline : public Object, public std::vector<SplineCoordinate*> {
00031 public:
00032         enum SubTypes {Opened, Closed};
00033 private:
00034         SubTypes subType;
00035 public:
00036         Spline();
00037         Spline(SplineCoordinate *, SplineCoordinate *);
00038         ~Spline();
00039         
00040         void setSubType (SubTypes subType) { this->subType = subType; }
00041         SubTypes getSubType () { return subType; }
00042         
00043         void write(std::ostream &stream) const;
00044 };

00046 inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Spline & s) {
00047         s.write(stream);
00048         return stream;
00049 }
